summary: Provides comprehensive unit tests for Django admin utility functions, including nested object hierarchy handling, cycle detection, deletion policies, and various helper utilities such as flattening data structures, field labeling, display formatting, quoting, related name resolution, safe string handling, and lookup value extraction.
business_intent: Validate that the admin utilities work correctly to preserve data integrity, correctly represent model relationships, and render admin interface elements reliably, thereby preventing bugs in object deletion workflows and admin display features.
